definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: The Border Town was a representative work of Shen Congwen, a Modernistic famous writer of China, .
sentences.chinese: 《邊城》是中國現代著名作家沈從文的代表之作。

sentences.english: The first chapter explores cognitive relationship between the ideology of May 4th Enlightenment and Shen Congwen as an intellectual.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，探究五四啓蒙思潮與沈從文身份認知的關係。

sentences.english: Just as his novels, Shen Congwens essay is also the art world that he created elaborately.
sentences.chinese: 沈從文的散文和小說一樣，是他精心營構的藝術世界。

sentences.english: In modern literary history, Shen Congwen was a special cultural phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在現代文學史上，沈從文是一個特殊的文化現象。

sentences.english: The instrumentality and aesthetics of art is perfectly integrated by Shen Congwen.
sentences.chinese: 沈從文使藝術的工具性與審美性得到了完美的結合。

sentences.english: In the paper the author applies the critic method of primitivism to appreciate Shen Congwen's novels.
sentences.chinese: 本文運用原始主義批評方法對沈從文小說加以解讀。

sentences.english: Shen Congwen's fictions of "Xiangxi" (the west part of Hunan Province) of subject matters are saturated with the spirit of Daoist art.
sentences.chinese: 沈從文的湘西題材小說浸透了道家藝術精神。

sentences.english: But the problem is that Zhang showed no affection to Shen.
sentences.chinese: 可是，問題在於張兆和對沈從文毫無感覺。

sentences.english: Without being an exception, Shen was also totally attracted by her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 毫無例外地，她的美麗，也讓沈從文一見傾心。

sentences.english: Chapter three addresses the background of the Enlightenment attitude of Shen Congwen.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，考察沈從文啓蒙的資源背景。

sentences.english: The fictions of Shen Congwen are of great theoretical value and practical significance.
sentences.chinese: 沈從文的小說富有極高的理論價值和實踐意義。

sentences.english: The more letters Shen wrote, the less patience he had.
sentences.chinese: 信越寫越多，沈從文也越發的沉不住氣。

sentences.english: Phoenix went to the city this afternoon, Shen from the experience of writing a happy and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 下午趕往鳳凰古城，體驗沈從文筆下的快樂與寧靜。

sentences.english: The second chapter discusses Shen Congwen emphatically to the healthy human nature praise.
sentences.chinese: 第二章着重探討沈從文對健康人性的禮讚。

sentences.english: Shen Congwen is a typical and special writer in Chinese modern literature history.
sentences.chinese: 在中國現代文學史上，沈從文是個典型而獨特的存在。

sentences.english: He had a copy of collected works of Shen congwen in his bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 他的書櫃中放了一本《沈從文別集》。

definition: Qian Zhongshu (1910-1998), literary academic and novelist, author of the 1947 novel Fortress Beseiged 圍城|围城
Wen Yiduo (1899-1946), poet and patriotic fighter, executed by Guomindang in Kunming
Camel Xiangzi, novel by Lao She 老舍
Tolstoy (name)/Count Lev Nikolayevich Tostoy (1828-1910), great Russian novelist, author of War and Peace 戰爭與和平|战争与和平
Xu Dishan (1893-1941), journalist, publisher and novelist
lit. like thunder piercing the ear/a well-known reputation (idiom)
Misty Poetry, a post-Cultural Revolution poetry movement
Tang Xianzu (1550-1616), Ming poet and dramatist, author of The Peony Pavilion 牡丹亭[Mu3 dan5 Ting2]
